summary.para: Values that specify the folder being acted on by methods of the interface.

remarks.para: In Windows Vista, an Server Message Block (SMB) share is created for both the Users and Public folders. As of Windows 7, the Public share is accessed through the Users share, so only Users is given an SMB share.
When methods are called with the DEFSHAREID_PUBLIC value, the restrictions specified by the value in that call apply to the Everyone access control entry (ACE).
When methods are called with the DEFSHAREID_USERS value, the restrictions specified by the value in that call apply to the Authenticated Users ACE.

summary.para: The Users folder (FOLDERID_UserProfiles). This folder is usually found at C:\Users.
The Public folder (FOLDERID_Public). This folder is usually found at C:\Users\Public.
